content: Nov 12 East West Bancorp Inc  which calls itself a "financial bridge" between the United States and China  agreed to improve its anti-money laundering controls and monitor high-risk customers more closely under an enforcement agreement announced on Thursday by the Federal Reserve.
name: East West Bancorp Inc
title: East West Bancorp agrees with Fed to improve laundering controls

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  January 30 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed East West Bancorp (EWBC)  ratings at 'BBB/F2'. The Rating Outlook remains Stable. The affirmation reflects  the bank's strong profitability and solid franchise. The rating action follows a periodic review of the large regional banking group   which includes BOK Financial Corp. (BOKF)  Cathay General Bancorp (CATY)  First  Horizon National Corp.
